name: CompUp
headline: Building a compensation graph to help companies optimise people spend
description:
With over 500M white-collared job offers rolled out annually, companies find it very difficult to be certain about what to offer. Companies rely on old compensation survey data, which are updated only once every year.

The salary expectations of candidates in the market change significantly on a quarterly basis (~7% statistically) in the startup ecosystem.

This results in more than 50% of qualified/selected candidates not joining the company due to expectation mismatch.

CompUp is an API-driven compensation benchmarking tool. We integrate with your existing HR/payroll systems, removing the need for manual data entry, and also getting updated in real-time.

CompUp provides the most accurate real-time compensation benchmarking data which helps you make the right offer to the candidate. The platform allows you to make better compensation decisions such as annual increments, candidate offers using internal and external data. 

This has the following advantages :
- All the process of compensation data submission is automatic and needs no manual intervention
- Since the job market is dynamic in nature, the offers made on CompUp's real-time benchmarks would be the most efficient
- The presentation of the offer to the candidate makes it look more appealing and explanatory to the candidate

generated_description:
CompUp is a dynamic startup based in Bengaluru, India, founded in 2020 as part of Y Combinator Batch S22. At its core, CompUp is tackling a significant challenge in the hiring ecosystem: the outdated and infrequent nature of compensation data, which leaves companies struggling to make competitive offers. With over 500 million white-collar job offers released annually, many companies are stuck relying on compensation surveys that are updated just once a year. Given that salary expectations in the fast-paced startup environment can change significantly—up to 7% every quarter—this creates a real risk of losing qualified candidates due to mismatched expectations.

Enter CompUp, an API-driven compensation benchmarking tool designed to provide real-time, accurate compensation data integrated smoothly with existing HR and payroll systems. This means no more tedious manual data entry; instead, organizations can access the latest benchmarks effortlessly. CompUp’s platform empowers companies to make informed compensation decisions that not only optimize talent acquisition but also enhance retention strategies.

### Why Choose CompUp?
- **Automation**: The compensation data submission process is entirely automated, minimizing human error and reducing administrative burden.
- **Real-Time Insights**: With a constantly updated database, companies can make immediate offers that reflect current market rates, increasing the likelihood of acceptance from prospective hires.
- **Enhanced Presentation**: The tool not only provides numbers but also presents them in a compelling, easy-to-understand manner that resonates with candidates.

Currently, CompUp boasts a robust team of 35 and has garnered trust from over 200 leading startups and enterprises. Key products include Compensation Management, HireSure.ai for candidate offer workflows, Compensation Benchmarking, Reward Statements, and soon, People Analytics.

Reviews speak volumes; customers rave about the platform, noting its effectiveness in streamlining compensation tasks and enhancing hiring workflows. CompUp has transformed traditional compensation planning, enabling companies to implement world-class strategies more simply and effectively.

In summary, CompUp is revolutionizing how companies approach salary offerings, making it easier to attract and retain top talent in an ever-evolving market. If you’re ready to elevate your compensation strategies, visit [CompUp's website](https://www.compup.io) for more information.
